actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Food Stamp Act of 1964 to provide that the presence in a household of an otherwise able-bodied adult person shall not make such household ineligible for food stamps if such person is or has been mentally ill and is regularly participating in a treatment and rehabilitation program.

summary.text: Provides, under the Food Stamp Act, that the presence in a household of an otherwise able-bodied adult person shall not make such household ineligible for food stamps if such person is or has been mentally ill and is regularly participating in a treatment and rehabilitation program.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Food Stamp Act of 1964 to provide that the presence in a household of an otherwise able-bodied adult person shall not make such household ineligible for food stamps if such person is or has been mentally ill and is regularly participating in a treatment and rehabilitation program.
